header.title: lib

erlref.modulesummary: A number of useful library functions

warning.p: This module is retained for compatibility. It may disappear without warning in a future release.

desc.p: Flushes the message buffer of the current process.
Prints error message Args in accordance with Format. Similar to io:format/2, see io(3).

func.fsummary: Return name of Erlang start script

desc.p: Returns the name of the script that started the current Erlang session.
Removes the last newline character, if any, in String1.
This function to makes it possible to send a message using the apply/3 BIF.

func.fsummary: Send a message and wait for an answer

desc.p: As send/2, but waits for an answer. It is implemented as follows:
desc.code: sendw(To, Msg) -> To ! {self(),Msg}, receive Reply -> Reply end.
desc.p: The message returned is not necessarily a reply to the message sent.
